explanation: [0-0] The frame shows a solid green background. Then a little boy appears from the bottom of the frame, he has blonde hair and is wearing a blue-green T-shirt with a yellow star on it. He opens his arms with a big smile. Above his head, five emojis appear in sequence: a smiling face with hearts, a sad face, a smiling face with its tongue sticking out, an angry face, and a neutral smiling face.
